articles.author: Kathleen Magramo
articles.title: List of places suspending some US parcel shipments grows as tariff exemption ends - CNN
articles.description: Japan, Australia and Taiwan have joined a growing list of places suspending some parcel shipments to the United States following the implementation of new rules under President Donald Trump’s administration that will end tariff exemptions.
